<a target="_blank" href="https://www.peoplescollection.wales/itesm/19105">Transcription for 19105</a>

The man with the cool face is the man that is doing, digging the coal.
So the more men they could get with the cool face and the less men they could get doing their work,
the more profitable it was.
He not understood.
Everybody accepts that.
But the further in it was going, it meant more timber, piece of cartof.
Puts another engine to pull up.
The man didn't have an engine like myself.
I wasn't doing anything to create the coal.
It was all in the coal.
It had come from the man that was digging it.
